title: The Complete Works of Pliny The Younger - Pliny The Younger
description:
The letters of Pliny the Younger have preserved for posterity a precious portrait of First Century life, detailing the daily routines of the Roman times and the men and women that inhabited the authorâ€™s world. The famous account of the eruption of Vesuvius and Emperor Trajanâ€™s advice concerning the treatment of Christians are among the lettersâ€™ fascinating treasures. The Ancient Classics series provides eReaders with the wisdom of the Classical world, with both English translations and the original Latin texts. This comprehensive eBook presents the complete works of Pliny the Younger, with beautiful illustrations, informative introductions and the usual Delphi bonus material. (Version 1)
